item.title: About
item.description: Hey 👋 I am an open-source developer 🌏 who also: Develops the The V Programming Language as one of the core developers 🧑‍🏭 Loves compilers, terminal, devtools, backend and low level programming 🪛 Learns new technologies 📓 Knows a lot of programming languages and technologies 🤹 Volunteers for FOSS United and several other communities 🙌 Helps in maintaining NixOS and catppuccin 👨‍🚒 Writes on Dev.to ✍️ Speaks on several in-depth tech talks 🎤

item.title: Experience
item.description: The V Programming Language Organisation Duration : August 2022 – Present Occupation: Core Developer - Part Time Location: Remote Working as a paid Open Source Contributor to develop The V Programming Language. Fixed several checker, parser, scanner, and code generation-related issues. Implemented features like operator overloading, syntax highlighting for v doc, match branch range expressions with constants, non-string map keys, etc. Documented and developed several internal libraries. Effective·AF Duration : August 2023 – October 2023

item.title: Open Source
item.description: Contributing to Open Source 🌏 since mid 2019. The V Programming Language My first open source organization on which I started to contribute to and done a lot of significant things there. Check out my commits and PRs done by me there! Highlights Fixed several checker, parser, scanner, and code generation-related issues. Implemented features like operator overloading, syntax highlighting for v doc, match branch range expressions with constants, non-string map keys, etc.

item.title: Projects
item.description: I spend most of my OSS coding time contributing to several big open-source projects, see here, but I also wrote and maintain a few projects of my own that I’m proud of 😄 Box CLI Maker Box CLI Maker is a Highly Customized Terminal Box Maker. Features Make a Terminal Box in 8️⃣ inbuilt different styles 16 Inbuilt Colors and True Color Support 🎨 Custom Title Positions 📏 Make your Terminal Box style 📦 Support for ANSI, Tabbed, Multi-line and Line Wrapping boxes 📑 Align the text according to your needs 📐 Unicode, Emoji and Windows Console Support 😋 Highlights 400+ Stars on GitHub Used in Kubernetes minikube Featured on GoLang Weekly twice (issue#340 and issue#435) Featured on GitHub Radar November 2022 Featured on GitHub India CLI Badges CLI Badges generate badges for your CLI with Deno
